duck: Radial tire - A radial tyre is a particular design of automotive tyre.
A radial pattern is one that appears to radiate from a point, like the spokes from the hub of a wheel
radial definition: arranged or having parts arranged like rays.
Radial nerve - The radial nerve is a nerve in the human body that supplies the upper limb.
Radial engine - The radial engine is a reciprocating type internal combustion engine configuration in which the cylinders point outward from a central crankshaft like the spokes on a wheel.
Radial axle on a locomotive or carriage
Radial artery - In human anatomy, the radial artery is the main blood vessel, with oxygenated blood, of the lateral aspect of the forearm.
Radial (radio), used to determine average elevation above mean sea level within a radio station's coverage area

milestones: Newly discovered extra-solar planet may be Earth-like
Huge star cluster discovered in neighbourhood of Milky Way
Discovery of smallest exoplanet yields 'extraordinary' find
Evo Morales hoaxed by a Spanish Church-owned radio station
Hubble discovers 16 new planets
World's first double arm transplant undertaken in Munich
Scientists discover Earth-like planet

wiki.text:
'Radial' can refer to:
* Vector (geometric), a line
* Radius, adjective form of
* A radial pattern is one that appears to radiate from a point, like the spokes
  from the hub of a wheel
* A bearing from a waypoint, such as a VOR
* Radial (radio), used to determine average elevation above mean sea level
  within a radio station's coverage area
* Radial artery
* Radial axle on a locomotive or carriage
* Radial engine
* Radial nerve
* Radial symmetry, one of the types of distribution of body parts or shapes
  in biology
* Radial tire
* Radius (bone), a bone of the forearm
* Radial set
wiki.title: radial
